attributes.action: Recognition of the commitment by working parents towards enforced home schooling
attributes.additional_details: This situation has been dropped without discussion on parents who have no experience in teaching children, especially at primary school age, where keeping a child focused takes every ounce of effort whilst trying keep working to pay the bills. Every other industry seems to have received some form of compensation for business disruption.
attributes.background: To recognise the effort and commitment undertaken by working parents during this period of enforced home schooling. Either with an accreditation from the National Union of Teachers (NUT), a commendation within the 2021 Queens honours list or some form of financial remuneration from the government.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Grant Payment To Parents Helping Kids During Home Learning
